mapper.select: SELECT MGBS_CCOMPANYID, MGBS_CSECTIONID, MO_CLAYEREDSECTIONID AS MGBS_CLAYEREDSECTIONID, MGBS_CBELOWORSINGLE FROM MAST_GROUPBASESECTION, MAST_ORGANISATION WHERE MGBS_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND MGBS_CSYSTEMID = #{systemCode} AND MGBS_CGROUPID = #{groupCode} AND MGBS_DSTARTDATE <= to_date(#{date},'yyyy/mm/dd') AND MGBS_DENDDATE >= to_date(#{date},'yyyy/mm/dd') AND MO_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = MGBS_CCUSTOMERID AND MO_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = MGBS_CCOMPANYID AND MO_CSECTIONID_CK = MGBS_CSECTIONID AND MO_DSTART <= to_date(#{date},'yyyy/mm/dd') AND MO_DEND >= to_date(#{date},'yyyy/mm/dd')
